# Welcome to Bäcker & Charlie!

We’re a cozy neighborhood bakery and café in Cox Town, Bangalore, serving authentic German artisanal baked goods.

# Our Mission

We aim to bring people together with honest food and an authentic café experience that keeps them coming back for the unique taste they can only find here.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6856861953e53dcd1e0d00f1/68582f7f3538fc9ed8ce12c7_WHEAT---RED--INDIVIDUAL-ELEMENTS---RED.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6856861953e53dcd1e0d00f1/68582ea79cda69b64ee09318_CHARLIE---RED--INDIVIDUAL-ELEMENTS---RED.png)

# Meet Bäcker & Charlie

Bäcker & Charlie is more than just a name – it’s an idea.

“Bäcker” means baker in German, reflecting our commitment to authentic German baking traditions.

“Charlie” represents a bear, symbolizing Berlin’s spirit of friendship, warmth, and connection.
